title: Annual performance of the Dow Jones Composite Index 2000 to 2019
summary: The year-end value of the S & P Dow Jones Composite Index National Index amounted to 9386.48 in 2019 .
The Index value was equal to 100 as of 2000 , so if the Index value is equal to 130 in a given Year , for example , it means that the house prices increased by 30 % since 2000 .

S & P/Case Dow Jones Composite Index Annual indices – additional information The S & P Dow Jones Composite Index National Index is calculated on a monthly basis and is based on the prices of single-family homes in nine Annual Census divisions : New England , Middle Atlantic , East North Central , West North Central .
gold: The Dow Jones Composite Index finished the year 2019 at 9,386.48 points . This is the highest point of the index in the past two decades . What is Dow Jones Composite Index ? The Dow Jones Composite Index is one of the indices from the Dow Jones index family .
